text: Shida Kaviani, Shirin Kaviani, Shideh Kaviani. Those names probably don't immediately ring any bells, but a mention of the sisters'popular and super affordable clothing brand, Naked Wardrobe, should do the trick. The label, whose Instagram page boasts over 1. 1 million followers, was founded in 2012 on the desire to create basic wardrobe essentials — bodysuits, biker shorts, and figure - hugging dresses, all of which fall under the $ 100 price point — that not only ` ` look good, but feel good and makes customers happy, all at an affordable price.''
